channel.title: Hosting speed
channel.description:
If i put up my server. Will it make my computer slow?
Will it make my internet slow? (if slow internet, how slow?)

item.title: Hosting speed
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

Get an PC with 2 harddrives and install 8gb + 2gb ram.
Boot your prefered OS on the good harddrive; install 2gb ram on this.
Boot your prefered OS for your server on the other harddrive; install 8gb ram on this.
Port Forwarding

Read full topic

item.title: Hosting speed
item.dc:creator: @animeking1120 animeking1120
item.description:
@animeking1120 wrote:

i dont think hosting uses much ram unless you run the client, then it might but as for your internet no, and wat the other guy said, if you download stuff and use your bandwidth all of your players will probably lag a little bit depending on what you do.

Read full topic

item.title: Hosting speed
item.dc:creator: @dannydude8 dannydude8
item.description:
@dannydude8 wrote:

No. Ur internet would be fine. Ur players are the ones who have to worry about lag. If ur downloading stuff it will lag ur players. If ur using tons of ram you will lag ur players.

Read full topic
